group_1.textRight: But…If I don't do anything, Heruka will have@to shoulder that burden all alone.
I won't allow it…@That's all I have to say.

group_1.textCenter: (...Again. That's exactly what I'm talking about.)

group_1.narration: I know Dolma is doing everything she can@so I'm not singled out.
But her worries are unfounded.@I could never have been that type@of special person in the first place.@I'm just an imperfect being@who couldn't protect everyone.
The only reason I'm still surviving,@even though I'm a good-for-nothing,@is because Dolma is still alive.
I won't let them take away the only life@that I was able to save.

group_1.textRight: ...And while you're staying here, you're going@to have to attend lectures and trainings.

group_1.textLeft: Why?

group_1.textRight: Why…? Well, what are you going to do@once the fighting is over?
You should focus on your studies,@because it's for your own good.
Plus it's important to learn how@to work well in a group.

group_1.narration: Dolma is so considerate and thoughtful…
But that tenderness is what makes her willing@to take on such a risky position.
…I won't allow anything to happen to her!@I have to protect her!
I hope Dolma isn't suffering@from nightmares anymore…

group_1.textLeft: Dolma…@Did you have another nightmare?

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah… I'm sorry.@I didn't mean to wake you up…

group_1.textLeft: What are you talking about?@We've shared a room since we came here.

group_1.textRight: …Right.

group_1.textLeft: Want me to hold your hand?

group_1.textRight: Hold it…?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.

group_1.narration: I've defeated the Mongolian forces that invaded@the nunnery on several occasions.
However, they were only scouting forces and@our luck can only hold out for so long.@If the main army attacked, we'd be done for.

group_1.textLeft: Rabi… That's your name, right?@The new girl here at the nunnery.

group_1.textRight: What? …Um, yes.

group_1.textLeft: I can show you around the town if you'd like.@And I have a favor to ask of you.

group_1.narration: That's why I need someone@to save Dolma instead of me…

group_1.textRight: Oh, are you guys heading out?@Let's go have a cup of butter tea together.

group_1.textLeft: (Dolma…?!)
Butter tea?

group_1.textRight: Since Heruka likes it, then so do I!

group_1.textLeft: Is that so?@I thought you weren't fond of the taste…

group_1.textRight: If I say I like it, then I like it!@[chara:833300:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:833300:cheek_0][chara:833300:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:833300:motion_300][chara:833300:lipSynch_1]C'mon, I'm thirsty! Let's go!

group_1.textLeft: …Then it can't be helped.

group_1.narration: "If the Mongolian Army attacks, I want you@to take Dolma and run away from here."@I was going to ask her that, but I suppose@it'll have to wait for another time.
It's just… Considering the situation,@the Mongols will be making a move soon.

group_1.textCenter: (That's right, there's no time to spare…@I have to ask Rabi soon.)

group_1.textLeft: [chara:105101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Butter tea is the BEST!
I could never get tired of drinking it,@no matter how many cups I've had…

group_1.textRight: Hahaha… It's true, you really like it…

group_1.textLeft: [chara:105101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock](Oops... I wasn't looking for an opportunity@to ask her at all...)
Um… Yep, that's me!@That's totally me!

group_1.textRight: ...What's with you all of a sudden?@[chara:833300:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:833300:cheek_0][chara:833300:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:833300:lipSynch_1]Hey, Rabi?
[chara:103301:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Blech…

group_1.textLeft: What's wrong?@Did you not like your butter tea?

group_1.textRight: It's not how I expected at all…
I thought it would be sweet, but it's so salty…

group_1.textLeft: Is this your first time having it?@It's a really common drink in Tibet.

group_1.textRight: Um… Well, I suppose I haven't had a chance@to drink much.
Ugh... It's still salty.

group_1.textLeft: Butter tea is sweet.

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Try to believe that, and it will be sweet.

group_1.textRight: …Is that so?

group_1.textLeft: Yes… Because if you truly believe something,@it will come true.
That's the way this world is designed.

group_1.textRight: …Should we head back soon?

group_1.textLeft: I'll be very sad to see you go...
We had a nice chat over a cup of butter tea...
I only wish we could have more time together…
(...But I don't!@I need to ask Rabi for that favor…)
Calm down, Deki.@Lower your voice a little.

group_1.textRight: But this is important! This time we actually@caught one of those Mongol lackeys!!
